text: Princess Beatrice, Mrs Edoardo Mapelli Mozzi (born Beatrice Elizabeth Mary; 8 August 1988) is a member of the British royal family. She is currently 9th in the Line of Succession. Beatrice was born at The Portland Hospital for Women and Children in London, She is the daughter of Andrew, Duke of York and Sarah, Duchess of York. Beatrice studied history at Goldsmiths, University of London. She got engaged in September 2019 to Edoardo Mapelli Mozzi. The couple got married on 17 July 2020. She gave birth to a daughter, Sienna Elizabeth Mapelli Mozzi, on 18 September 2021 at the Chelsea and Westminster Hospital in Chelsea London. She gave birth to a second daughter, Athena Elizabeth Rose Mapelli Mozzi, on 22 January 2025. == Titles == 8 August 1988-17 July 2020: Her Royal Highness Princess Beatrice of York 17 July 2020 - Present: Her Royal Highness Princess Beatrice,Countess Mapelli-Mozzi, Noble Donna, Mrs. Eduardo Mapelli-Mozzi. ==References== ==Other websites== * category:1988 births category:Living people Category:British princesses Category:House of Windsor Category:People with dyslexia
title: Princess Beatrice
